title: PROD: Device Communication & Network Health Dashboard

targets.query: from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "mqtt") |> count() |> yield(name: "MQTT Events")
from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "websocket") |> count() |> yield(name: "WebSocket Events")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "mqtt" or r["source"] == "websocket") |> count() |> yield(name: "Network Activity")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> group(columns: ["domain"]) |> yield(name: "{{domain}}")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] =~ /(light|switch|sensor|climate)/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> group(columns: ["domain", "entity_id"]) |> mean() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 25) |> yield(name: "Device Activity")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> group(columns: ["entity_id"]) |> yield(name: "{{entity_id}}")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> group(columns: ["source"]) |> count() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true) |> yield(name: "Protocol Usage")
from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "unavailable") |> count() |> yield(name: "Unavailable Devices")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "on" or r["state"] == "off") |> count() |> yield(name: "Connected Devices")
from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "mqtt") |> count() |> yield(name: "MQTT Connected")
